name: woodland goblin
dieMessage: the woodland @c-bold-on@@c-magenta@goblin@c-reset@ hisses with its last breath, thrashing violently until its death.

attackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ cackles as it hops around before striking at @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ runs circles around @player-name@ before jumping at @player-name@'s neck!
The @npc-color-name@ spits a putrid burning fluid at @player-name@!

criticalAttackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ jumps and latches onto @player-name@ back, violently scratching @player-names@ face and neck and sending @player-name@'s @c-red@blood@c-reset@ dripping down their armor!
The @npc-color-name@ jumps and latches onto @player-name@'s legs, and begins @c-yellow@@c-bold-on@GNAWING@c-reset@ on @player-name@ until reaching bone!

battleMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ spits a putrid burning fluid at @player-name@!

idleMessages.message: A @npc-color-name@ scurries and hops around through the woods.
